entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
